description: Return the length of the longest alternating (alternating between '0' and '1') subarray after removing at most one element from the binary string.

testCases.explanation: '010' is already alternating with length 3; no removal needed.
Remove one '1' to get '100' or remove one '1' to get '010'; longest alternating subarray has length 3.
Remove one '1' to get '111'; best alternating subarray after one removal has length 2 (e.g., keep one '1' and the gap).
